अवधान Derived from the Sanskrit word \"अवधान\" (Avadhāna) meaning attention, focus, or mental presence. Avdhāan is rooted in ancient Indian traditions that trained the mind to stay centered and undistracted. In today\'s world of constant digital noise, Avdhāan helps you reclaim your time, block interruptions, and cultivate intentional focus.
You\'re in control - and we\'re here when you\'re ready. We understand you chose not to grant Accessibility access right now. You can always update your permissions from the home screen. To continue your journey with Avdhāan, we now request Usage Access. This permission helps us track which apps you use - without reading personal content - so we can offer you meaningful insights and help you build better focus habits. We understand you\'re not ready to grant App Usage permission right now.\n\nThis permission helps Avdhāan analyze your app usage patterns and offer personalized insights to boost your focus and productivity.\n\nYou can always enable it later from the home screen.\n\nThe good news? You can still proceed and start using Avdhāan\'s core feature — blocking distracting apps based on the schedule you define.
